stimulusHtml:
Inter quas Phoenissa recens a vulnere Dido
errabat silva in magna; quam Troius heros
ut primum iuxta stetit agnovitque per umbras
obscuram, qualem primo qui surgere mense
aut videt aut vidisse putat per nubila lunam,
demisit lacrimas dulcique adfatus amore est.

Aeneid 6.450-455

Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question.

1. According to lines 1-2, what was Dido doing?

2. Write out all of line 2 (errabat . . . heros) and mark the scansion.

3. What Latin word does obscuram (line 4) modify?

4. What literary device does Vergil use in lines 3-4 (qualem . . . lunam) to describe Dido?

5. (A) Translate in context dulci amore (line 6) and (B) identify the construction.

6. Identify the setting of the passage.
